scripts.build: npm run clean && newspack-scripts wp-scripts build --output-path assets/dist
scripts.start: npm run clean && newspack-scripts wp-scripts start --output-path assets/dist
scripts.release:archive: mkdir -p assets/release && zip -r assets/release/newspack-content-converter.zip . -x assets/release/\* bin/\* tests/\* node_modules/\* .git/\* .github/\* .cache/\* .gitignore .editorconfig .prettierrc phpcs.xml phpunit.xml.dist .DS_Store
